"The House That Walked" is a story about a house that has the ability to move around on its own.
The house was built on stilts, allowing it to lift off the ground and walk on them like legs.
The house was designed to be self-sustaining, with solar panels and wind turbines powering its movement.
The house was created by a team of engineers and architects who wanted to challenge traditional building methods and create something truly unique.
The house was built to be mobile, allowing it to be moved to different locations as needed, making it a perfect solution for people who want to live off the grid.
